      ABContact createCopy(ABContact contact)
      Creates a shallow copy of the {@link ABContact} and its Tags, Services and PrimaryAddress. This method can be customized to copy any custom fields or subtypes. The preferred way of copying the fields is #copyNonPersisting which creates a shallow copy and marks it as non-persisting.

      Merges two contacts and its addresses using the information from a {@link MergeContactsAddressHolder}. Makes selected address primary address of the contact and moves kept addresses and contact addresses to the merged contact.
      boolean updateIsFromMerge(ABContact contact)
      Tells if the contact is the kept contact in a merge that is in progress. Called by event rules so we don't send an update for that contact.

      • createCopy

        ABContact createCopy(ABContact contact)
        Creates a shallow copy of the {@link ABContact} and its Tags, Services and PrimaryAddress. This method can be customized to copy any custom fields or subtypes. The preferred way of copying the fields is #copyNonPersisting which creates a shallow copy and marks it as non-persisting.
        Parameters:
        contact - The contact of which to make a copy from
        Returns:
        The copied contact

      • createMergedContact

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The merged contact

      • merge

        void merge(ABContact keptContact,
         ABContact retiredContact,
         MergeContactsAddressHolder addressDataHolder,
         MergeContactsLinkedContactsHolder relatedContactsHolder,
         MergeContactsEFTDataHolder eftDataHolder)
        Merges two contacts and its addresses using the information from a {@link MergeContactsAddressHolder}. Makes selected address primary address of the contact and moves kept addresses and contact addresses to the merged contact.
        Parameters:
        keptContact -
        retiredContact - The contact to be merged; will become retired
        addressDataHolder - The UI address information
        relatedContactsHolder - The UI related contacts information
        eftDataHolder - The UI EFT information

      • updateIsFromMerge

        boolean updateIsFromMerge(ABContact contact)
        Tells if the contact is the kept contact in a merge that is in progress. Called by event rules so we don't send an update for that contact.
